name: Unsplash Clone
desc:
This website is a clone of 'Unsplash.com' which is a stock photography site, Here I implemented fuctionalities Login & Singup,Uploading Photo from local System, Photo Like, Seaching Photo ect.
Tech Stack: HTML,CSS,JavaScript.

name: Dermstore Clone
desc:
This website is a clone of 'Dermstore.com' which is a skin care and beauty e-commerce site in the United States & here I implemented some fuctionalities like Login & Singup, product page with sorting, add to cart etc.
Tech Stack: HTML,CSS,JavaScript.
